title: Code Snippet Manager
description: Personal tool to organize and quickly access code snippets across projects
details: Features: Syntax highlighting, search, categorization, export to GitHub Gist

title: LeetCode Problem Tracker
description: Dashboard to track coding problem progress with analytics
details: Visualizes problem-solving patterns, difficulty distribution, and streak tracking

title: Project Template Generator
description: CLI tool to quickly scaffold new project structures
details: Supports Flask, FastAPI, React templates with best practices

title: API Response Validator
description: Testing utility for validating API responses during development
details: JSON schema validation, response time tracking, automated testing

title: Git Commit Analyzer
description: Analyzes Git commit history to generate productivity insights
details: Shows commit frequency, peak productivity hours, language usage

title: Environment Config Manager
description: Secure management of environment variables across projects
details: Encrypted storage, easy switching between dev/prod configs
